text: The 2003 Casablanca bombings were multiple suicide bombings on May 16, 2003, in Casablanca, Morocco. The attacks were the deadliest terrorist attacks in Morocco. Forty-five people were killed in the attacks (33 victims and 12 suicide bombers). The suicide bombers came from the shanty towns in the poor suburb of Casablanca. ==References== Category:Casablanca Category:2003 crimes Category:Suicide bombings in Africa Category:Mass murder in Africa Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in Africa Category:Mass murder in the 2000s Category:Suicide bombings in the 2000s Category:2000s in Africa
title: 2003 Casablanca bombings
